official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States with respect to the classification of certain diamond articles.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the suspension of duty, through December 31, 1986, on industrial diamonds of tool and drill blanks.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States with respect to the classification of certain diamond articles.
